Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class View

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.View
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
CliView, GuiManager, RemoteView
public abstract class View extends Object implements EventListener
This abstract class is the parent of all the view of the game: RemoteView(Server),CliView(Client) and GuiManager(Client). Its methods update the game's data of the instance.
